What we offer

Quartet

Band is composed of 4-piece member (bass, guitar, violin, vocal, e-drums) and ideal for small parties and gatherings like birthdays, anniversaries, and the likes). Easy listening country, folk, soft rock music.

Read More

Full Band

A Full Band is composed of all Band Members (vocals, bass, fiddle/violin, guitar, e-drums) and ideal for big parties, anniversaries, product launching, PR Events, weddings, etc.)

Read More

Custom

Band composition depends on the client's preference including but not limited to members, instruments, and music genre.

Read More

About this Band

Folk Ridge is offering Folk, Country, and Rock N Roll music for discerning audience, both young and oldies who enjoy such genre. Its major musicality sprung from the idea that Country Music is almost dying particularly in the urban and it is high time to preserve the legacy and relive the greatness of Folk, Country, and Rock N Roll music.

A 5-member Band with the same passion for music, young and energetic, professionals and collaborative. In weddings, parties, reunions, and other large gatherings, this Band is an excellent choice in hearing toe tapper songs to complement the festive mood of the occasion.

Folk Ridgeâ€™s minor genres include Alternative, Modern Acoustic, Reggae, Soft Rock and Blues.
